title: The Qlozet ecosystem
subtitle: We bring every stakeholder into a value-sharing loop.

stakeholders.title: Customers
stakeholders.description: Personalized fit, custom design, transparent delivery and after-care.

stakeholders.title: Designers & Tailors
stakeholders.description: Order pipeline, style templates, measurement guardrails, QC workflows.

stakeholders.title: Fabric & Accessories Vendors
stakeholders.description: Instant storefronts, inventory sync, fabric swatches, trims, and pricing rules.

stakeholders.title: Logistics Partners
stakeholders.description: Pickup requests, shipping labels, zone-based SLAs, and delivery status APIs.

steps.text: Capture measurements (photo + height) → verify with AI overlays.
Choose a base style → tweak options (neck, sleeve, length, closures, trims).
Select fabric & accessories → pricing auto-updates with yardage & options.
Vendor accepts with lead time → production tracker + QC checkpoints.
Delivery & fit confirmation → alterations/after-care if needed.
